00028         }

00030         class TestOfDocComment extends UnitTestCase {
00031                 public function setUp() {
00032                         DocComment::clearCache();
00033                 }
00034         
00035                 public function testFinderFindsClassDocBlock() {
00036                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('SomeClass');
00037                         $finder = new DocComment();
00038                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($reflection), '');
00039                 }
00040                 
00041                 public function testFinderFindsFieldDocBlock() {
00042                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('SomeClass');
00043                         $property = $reflection->getProperty('field1');
00044                         $finder = new DocComment();
00045                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($property), '');
00046                         $property = $reflection->getProperty('field2');
00047                         $finder = new DocComment();
00048                         $this->assertFalse($finder->get($property));
00049                 }
00050                 
00051                 public function testFinderFindsMethodDocBlock() {
00052                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('SomeClass');
00053                         $method = $reflection->getMethod('method1');
00054                         $finder = new DocComment();
00055                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($method), '');
00056                         $method = $reflection->getMethod('method2');
00057                         $finder = new DocComment();
00058                         $this->assertFalse($finder->get($method));
00059                 }
00060                 
00061                 public function testMisplacedDocCommentDoesNotCausesDisaster() {
00062                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('SomeOtherClass');
00063                         $finder = new DocComment();
00064                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($reflection), false);
00065                 }
00066                 
00067                 public function testUnanotatedClassCanHaveAnotatedField() {
00068                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('SomeOtherClass');
00069                         $property = $reflection->getProperty('field1');
00070                         $finder = new DocComment();
00071                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($property), '');
00072                 }
00073                 
00074                 public function testParserIsOnlyCalledOncePerFile() {
00075                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('SomeClass');
00076                         $finder = new MockDocComment();
00077                         $finder->expectOnce('parse');
00078                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($reflection), false);
00079                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($reflection), false);
00080                         
00081                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('SomeClass');
00082                         $finder = new MockDocComment();
00083                         $finder->expectNever('parse');
00084                         $this->assertEqual($finder->get($reflection), false);
00085                 }
